meanings.definition: A person or thing that links.
meanings.sent1: The linkers in our group helped us all stay connected.
meanings.sent2: The linkers in the chain were strong and reliable.
meanings.sent3: The linkers at the party made sure everyone felt included.
meanings.sent4: She was like a linker, bringing people together effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The linker in the bridge held everything together securely.

meanings.definition: A device used to connect two parts of a chain or a piece of jewelry.
meanings.sent1: The jeweler used a delicate linker to join the necklace pieces.
meanings.sent2: The linker on the bracelet was beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent3: The linker on the necklace sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The linker acted like a tiny bridge between the chain links.
meanings.sent5: The golden linker added elegance to the jewelry piece.

meanings.definition: A computer program that combines different parts of a program during compilation.
meanings.sent1: The software engineer used linkers to merge the code seamlessly.
meanings.sent2: The linker integrated the modules to create the final program.
meanings.sent3: The linker worked tirelessly to connect all the program components.
meanings.sent4: The linker functioned like a conductor orchestrating the code symphony.
meanings.sent5: The powerful linker optimized the program's performance.
